thread.title: Ground News - Missing Bend man found alive in dry well: police
thread.title_full: Ground News - Missing Bend man found alive in dry well: police

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Missing Bend man found alive in dry well: police
text:
Summary by Ground News John McLerran, who had been missing since Monday, was found at the bottom of a dry well in a self-storage business in Bend . He was found by a worker at the business, which is located in a building on the city's east side. The man's body was found in a well at the back of the building. Share menu More
